div.div: Variability of species correlation coefficients across several variables.
div.p: Variation in all species' correlation coefficients (r) across the following variables for each species: ( A) number of individuals, ( B) difference between hottest and coldest collection year temperatures, ( C) mass range, ( D) mean mass, and ( E) absolute mean latitude. Horizontal lines are correlation coefficients of zero. The x-axes of some plots ( A, C, D) are on a log scale to better show spread of values.
